author: nehanarkhede
msg: KAFKA-263 Enhance single host broker failure test to have 2 topics with uneven distribution on the source brokers; patched by John Fung; reviewed by Neha Narkhede

author: struberg
msg: SCM-663 use git-diff --raw for getting the list of changed files
The output of git-pull was too depending on local settings and
to create reproducible results. We now replaced it with git-diff --raw
which is an internal format which is guaranteed to remain unchanged.
